name: Proprioception
description:
Hand-Eye Coordination and Multitasking are your primary tools as you try to get as many points as possible and keep the timer running!

  • Bonus points are awarded if you match both markers with the minimum amount of moves.
  • Another .5s is added for every successful match
Online Scoreboard is VERY beta, if the scoreboard on the right is blank the server is probably not responding at the moment.
After entering your name, wait a second before pressing space to ensure the scoreboard is updated.
  1. Proprioception (/ˌproʊpri.ɵˈsɛpʃən/ PRO-pree-o-SEP-shən), from Latin proprius, meaning "one's own", "individual," and capio, capere, to take or grasp, is the sense of the relative position of neighbouring parts of the body and strength of effort being employed in movement.

Press F9 for practice mode
